newsitem.title: USA: GATX sees Q1 EPS topping consensus.
newsitem.headline: GATX sees Q1 EPS topping consensus.

text.p: GATX Corp expects its first-quarter earnings to top the $1 to $1.10 per share street consensus by about 20 percent, the company said Friday.

The company said its GATX Terminals business, which operates storage tanks for chemicals and petroleum products, will post a loss for the quarter due to charges as it adopts to new business conditions.

However, George Lowman, director of investor relations, said "very strong performance" at the company's GATX Capital and Great American Transportation divisions more than offset weakness at GATX Terminals.
The company will report results on April 23.
